Paraphrased: ['The Devon and Cornwall Police conducted a thorough search of the area but were unable to locate the drone or its operator.', "Inspector Meredith expressed concern about the drone's close call with a passenger aircraft, emphasizing the operator's blatant disregard for public safety. The police are now appealing to the public for information to help identify and hold the reckless drone operator accountable."]

Original: ['The grey seal was found at Cruden Bay on Tuesday.', "The Scottish SPCA removed the seal from beach and took it to the charity's rescue centre where it was cut free."]

Original: ['The archive of travel writer, war hero and adventurer Sir Patrick Leigh Fermor has been catalogued by the National Library of Scotland.', "The trek provided the material for his most famous books, 'A Time of Gifts', 'Between the Woods and the Water' and 'The Broken Road'."]
Paraphrased: ['The extensive collection of travel writings, wartime experiences, and adventurous exploits of Sir Patrick Leigh Fermor has been thoroughly organized and catalogued by the National Library of Scotland.', "The experiences he had on the trek served as the inspiration for his most renowned works, including 'A Time of Gifts', 'Between the Woods and the Water', and 'The Broken Road'."]

Original: ["Mr Roache, who is secretary of the union's Yorkshire region, won 56.7% of the vote, while the only other candidate, Paul McCarthy, from the North West region, had 43.3%.", 'Mr Roache also paid tribute to Mr Kenny for his work "that has made GMB the envy of the union movement".']

Original: ['The club, which is owned by its fans via the Exeter City Supporters Trust, declared a total profit of £1.642m for 2014-15, mainly due to the sale of midfielder Matt Grimes to Swansea City.', "The club's accounts also show that Exeter had a surplus of shareholders' funds of £761,000, compared to a deficit of £880,000 the previous year and reduced their cost base by almost 5%."]

Original: ['Majid Rashed, vice president of the UAE International Paralympic Committee, confirmed "the throwing cage collapsed on the athlete\'s head".', '"I can say the throwing cage collapsed on the athlete\'s head - but how that happened, we can not say," Rashed said on Wednesday.']

Original: ["The Labour Force Survey and the Gross Domestic Product figures showed weakness in the Scottish economy, while covering an earlier part of 2016 than the Chambers' survey.", 'Neil Amner, chairman of the Scottish Chambers of Commerce economic advisory group, said: "Our latest economic data shows that many Scottish businesses will have a successful 2017, with business optimism remaining positive for many sectors.']

Original: ['Undercover: The allegations made to date\nOpening proceedings at the Royal Courts of Justice, Lord Justice Pitchford said: "It seems likely that the inquiry will expose both creditable and discreditable conduct, practice and management.', "Lord Justice Pitchford's inquiry at the Royal Courts of Justice will look into police infiltration of political and social justice groups in England and Wales since 1968."]

Original: ['It was seldom pretty but once again in this World Cup there was a gripping finale, the All Blacks holding that two-point lead for the last 12 minutes as their opponents finally tired.', 'South Africa were having significant success at the breakdown, New Zealand shipping six penalties in short order, and the world champions looked instead for territory, kicking behind the defence and into the corners.']

In response, the world champions focused on gaining territory by kicking behind the defense and into the corners.']

Original: ["Built on one of the highest points of the Blackdown Hills, the landmark was put up as a tribute to the Duke of Wellington's military achievements at the Battle of Waterloo.", 'Mr Evans, the trust\'s building surveyor, said the radar study was one of several being carried out to "understand this unique and somewhat complex monument".']

Original: ["How Zara's founder became the richest man in the world - for two days\nChairman and chief executive Pablo Isla emphasised the firm's investment in technology, saying the firm had expanded its online stores to 11 new countries in the period.", "All of the group's brands increased their international presence during the period, with 83 new stores opened in 38 countries."]

Original: ['Perhaps unsurprisingly, Miura holds the record as the oldest scorer in Japanese football - a winner in a second division match four months after his 48th birthday.', 'Last week ex-England striker Teddy Sheringham registered himself as a player for Stevenage - where he is manager - at the age of 49 but opted out of playing in a local cup competition.']
